bibl.title: Three Greek Papyri in Westminster College, Cambridge.
bibl.note: P. Westm. Coll. 1. Acknowledgment of the receipt of a share in a family inheritance. Soknopaiou Nesos, May 18, A.D. 45. - P. Westm. Coll. 2. Letter accompanying a return from the temples of Soknopaiou Nesos. August 24, A.D. 158. - P. Westm. Coll. 3. Recto. Copy of a letter from the strategos of the Great Oasis to a colleague of the Themistos and Polemon divisions of the Arsinoite. A.D. 200/1. - Verso. Accounts.
Crawford D.J. and P.E. Easterling, Three Greek Papyri in Westminster College, Cambridge.
